pageContext.course_type_long_description: Let your imagination run wild with tens of thousands of LEGOÂ® parts! Build engineer-designed projects such as: Trains, Helicopters, Treehouses, and Beam Bridges. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
pageContext.action_url_comment: You may register in person at the Community Center or online at www.cresskillboro.com. Keyword: Lego.
